articles.title: 45 residents test positive for COVID-19 at Kenosha nursing facility - WTMJ-TV
articles.description: 45 residents at a Kenosha skilled nursing facility have tested positive for COVID-19, according to the city of Kenosha.
articles.content:
KENOSHA 45 residents at a Kenosha skilled nursing facility have tested positive for COVID-19, according to the Kenosha County Division of Health.
